original_text: Then these men were bound in their cloaks, their tunics, their hats, and their other garments, and they were thrown into the burning fiery furnace.
korean_text: 그러자 그 사람들을 겉옷과 속옷과 모자와 다른 옷을 입은 채 결박하여 맹렬히 타는 풀무불 가운데에 던졌더라

sentences.original_text: Then these men were bound in their cloaks,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이 사람들은 그들의 겉옷에 묶였고,

sentences.original_text: their tunics, their hats, and their other garments,
and they were thrown into the burning fiery furnace.
